Verses: 1 eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththaanaagiya Meegaa Ennum Perulla Oru Manushan Irundhaan.

2 avan Than Thaayai Nokki: Unnidaththilirundha Aayiraththu Nooru Vellikkaasu Kalavupoyitre, Adhaik Kuriththu En Kaadhugal Ketka Nee Saabamittaaye, Andhap Panam, Idho, Ennidaththil Irukkiradhu; Adhai Eduththavan Naandhaan Endraan. Adharku Avan Thaai: En Magane, Nee Karththaraal Aaseervadhikkappaduvaai Endraal.

3 avan Andha Aayiraththu Nooru Vellikkaasaith Than Thaayinidaththil Thirumbak Koduththaan; Aval: Vettappatta Oru Suroobaththaiyum Vaarppikkappatta Oru Vikkiragaththaiyum Undu Panna, Naan En Kaiyilirundha Indha Velliyai En Maganukkaaga Mutrilum Karththarukkendru Niyamiththen; Ippozhudhum Idhai Unakkuth Thirumbak Kodukkiren Endraal.

4 avan Andha Velliyaith Than Thaaikkuth Thirumbak Koduththaan; Appozhudhu Avan Thaai Irunooru Vellikkaasai Eduththu, Thattaan Kaiyile Koduththaal; Avan Adhinaale, Vettappatta Oru Suroobaththaiyum Vaarppikkappatta Oru Vikkiragaththaiyum Panninaan; Avaigal Meegaavin Veettil Irundhadhu.
5 meegaa, Suvaamikku Oru Araiveettai Niyamiththu Vaiththirundhaan; Avan Oru Epoththaiyum Suroobangalaiyum Undupanni, Than Kumaararil Oruvanaip Pradhishtai Panninaan; Ivan Avanukku Aasaariyanaanaan.
6 annaatkalil Isravelile Raajaa Illai, Avanavan Than Than Paarvaikku Saripponapadi Seydhuvandhaan.
7 yoodhaavilulla Pedhlegem Ooraanum Leviyanumaana Oru Vaaliban Ange Thangiyirundhaan.

8 andha Manushan Engeyaagilum Paradhesiyaaip Poith Thangumpadikku, Yoodhaavilulla Pedhlegem Ooraivittup Purappattup Prayaanam Pogaiyil, Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththil Irukkira Meegaavin Veettil Vandhu Serndhaan.
9 enge Irundhu Vandhaai Endru Meegaa Avanaik Kettadharku, Avan: Naan Yoodhaavilulla Pedhlegem Ooraanaagiya Leviyan, Engeyaagilum Poith Thangap Pogiren Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Meegaa: Nee Ennidaththil Iru, Nee Enakkuth Thagappanum Aasaariyanumaayiruppaai; Naan Unakku Varushaththile Paththu Vellikkaasaiyum, Maatru Vasthiraththaiyum, Unakku Vendiya Aagaaraththaiyum Koduppen Endru Avanidaththil Sonnaan; Appadiye Leviyan Ulle Ponaan.
11 andha Leviyan Andha Manidhanidaththil Irukka Sammadhiththaan; Andha Vaaliban Avanukku Avan Kumaararil Oruvanaippol Irundhaan.
12 meegaa Andha Leviyanaip Pradhishtai Panninaan; Andha Vaaliban Avanukku Aasaariyanaagi Meegaavin Veettil Irundhaan.
13 appozhudhu Meegaa: Enakku Aasaariyanaaga Oru Leviyan Adappattapadiyinaal, Karththar Enakku Nanmaiseyvaar Endru Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkiren Endraan.
